ds_agent.h
00001 #ifndef NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_H
00002 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_H
00003 /*
00004  * defines agent's default store registrations 
00005  */
00006 /*
00007  * Note:
00008  *    If new ds_agent entries are added to this header file,
00009  *    then remember to run 'perl/agent/default_store/gen' to
00010  *    update the corresponding perl interface.
00011  */
00012 
00013 /*
00014  * booleans 
00015  */
00016 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_VERBOSE        0       /* 1 if verbose output desired */
00017 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_ROLE           1       /* 0 if master, 1 if client */
00018 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_NO_ROOT_ACCESS 2       /* 1 if we can't get root access */
00019 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_AGENTX_MASTER  3       /* 1 if AgentX desired */
00020 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_QUIT_IMMEDIATELY 4     /* 1 to never start the agent */
00021 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_DISABLE_PERL   5       /* 1 to never enable perl */
00022 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_NO_CONNECTION_WARNINGS 6 /* 1 = !see !connect msgs */
00023 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_LEAVE_PIDFILE  7       /* 1 = leave PID file on exit */
00024 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_NO_CACHING     8       /* 1 = disable netsnmp_cache */
00025 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_STRICT_DISMAN  9       /* 1 = "correct" object ordering */
00026 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_DONT_RETAIN_NOTIFICATIONS 10   /* 1 = disable trap logging */
00027 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_DONT_LOG_TCPWRAPPERS_CONNECTS 12   /* 1 = disable logging */
00028 #define NETSNMP_DS_APP_DONT_LOG         NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_DONT_RETAIN_NOTIFICATIONS /* compat */
00029 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_SKIPNFSINHOSTRESOURCES    13   /* 1 = don't store NFS entries in hrStorageTable */
00030 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_REALSTORAGEUNITS 14    /* 1 = use real allocation units in hrStorageTable, 0 = recalculate it to fit 32bits */
00031 
00032    /* Repeated from "apps/snmptrapd_ds.h" */
00033 #define NETSNMP_DS_APP_NUMERIC_IP       16
00034 #define NETSNMP_DS_APP_NO_AUTHORIZATION 17
00035 
00036 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_DISKIO_NO_FD   18      /* 1 = don't report /dev/fd*   entries in diskIOTable */
00037 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_DISKIO_NO_LOOP 19      /* 1 = don't report /dev/loop* entries in diskIOTable */
00038 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_DISKIO_NO_RAM  20      /* 1 = don't report /dev/ram*  entries in diskIOTable */
00039 
00040 /* WARNING: The trap receiver also uses DS flags and must not conflict with these!
00041  * If you define additional boolean entries, check in "apps/snmptrapd_ds.h" first */
00042 
00043 /*
00044  * strings 
00045  */
00046 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_PROGNAME 0     /* argv[0] */
00047 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_X_SOCKET 1     /* AF_UNIX or ip:port socket addr */
00048 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_PORTS    2     /* localhost:9161,tcp:localhost:9161... */
00049 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_INTERNAL_SECNAME  3    /* used by disman/mteTriggerTable. */
00050 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_PERL_INIT_FILE    4    /* used by embedded perl */
00051 #define NETSNMP_DS_SMUX_SOCKET    5     /* ip:port socket addr */
00052 #define NETSNMP_DS_NOTIF_LOG_CTX  6     /* "" | "snmptrapd" */
00053 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_TRAP_ADDR      7     /* used as v1 trap agent address */
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * integers 
00057  */
00058 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_FLAGS    0     /* session.flags */
00059 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_USERID   1
00060 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_GROUPID  2
00061 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_AGENTX_PING_INTERVAL 3 /* ping master every SECONDS */
00062 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_AGENTX_TIMEOUT  4
00063 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_AGENTX_RETRIES  5
00064 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_X_SOCK_PERM     6      /* permissions for the */
00065 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_X_DIR_PERM      7      /*     AgentX socket   */
00066 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_X_SOCK_USER     8      /* ownership for the   */
00067 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_X_SOCK_GROUP    9      /*     AgentX socket   */
00068 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_CACHE_TIMEOUT  10      /* default cache timeout */
00069 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_INTERNAL_VERSION  11   /* used by internal queries */
00070 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_INTERNAL_SECLEVEL 12   /* used by internal queries */
00071 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_MAX_GETBULKREPEATS 13 /* max getbulk repeats */
00072 #define NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_MAX_GETBULKRESPONSES 14   /* max getbulk respones */
00073 
00074 #endif
